channel.title: Godot on GDQuest
channel.description: Recent content in Godot on GDQuest

item.title: Available content in the Godot Course
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: The course comes in 3 versions. Indie contains all of Hobby, and Pro contains all chapters from Hobby and Indie, and extra resources: Hobby Indie Pro If you’re only looking for UI tutorials, check out our standalone course: Create User Interface Godot Course You’ll find some free tutorial samples below. I also released the Finite State Machine demo open source, for the official Godot documentation.

item.title: Create Professional User Interface in Godot
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: In this course, you will learn how to best create User Interfaces for your games with the open source Godot Engine. This series is included in our larger Make Professional Games with Godot course. We made it as a standalone if you only want to learn about interface! So you only pay for the chapters you need ðŸ˜„ I’ve been one of the biggest contributors to Gdoot’s official UI tutorials, like the Intro to Godot’s UI system.

item.title: make professional 2d games with godot
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Become a better game developer! With this course, you will learn to create the main mechanics and systems in your own games, using the Free Godot Game Engine. Unlike in many beginner courses that show how to code a specific game step-by-step, this one will teach you professional game creation techniques you can apply to any type of game! Purchasing the Pro course is the best investment I have made.
